mapper.insert: insert into log(time, type, message, operation_teacher, operation_student, operation_table) values (#{log.time}, #{log.type}, #{log.message}, #{log.operation_teacher}, #{log.operation_student}, #{log.operation_table})
mapper.select: select * from log order by time desc
select * from log where date_format(time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m-%d') order by time desc
select * from log where operation_teacher = #{username} order by time desc
select * from log where operation_student = #{id} order by time desc
select * from log where operation_table = #{table} order by time desc
select * from log where date_format(time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y-%m') order by time desc
select * from log where date_format(time, '%Y') = date_format(#{time}, '%Y') order by time desc
